name: pbkdf2sha512
description: node crypto's async pbkdf2 promisified and with sane defaults

scripts.example: npm run example:bundle && npm run example:serve
scripts.example:bundle: browserify spec/example/index.ts -p [ tsify -p spec/example ] --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude randombytes --exclude buffer --exclude tslib --exclude debug -t uglifyify -o spec/example/index.js
scripts.example:bundle:watch: watchify spec/example/index.ts -p [ tsify -p spec/example ] --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude randombytes --exclude buffer --exclude tslib --exclude debug -o spec/example/index.js --debug -v
scripts.test:coverage: npm run pretest && karma start spec/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage -t html && http-server -c-1 -o -p 8888 spec/reports/coverage
scripts.test:ci: karma start spec/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly
scripts.test:web: browserify spec/*.spec.ts -p [ tsify -p spec ] --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude randombytes --exclude buffer --exclude tslib -t uglifyify -o spec/web/index.spec.js && npm run test:web:serve
